outDir.description: Path where the metadata should be written to.

typelibImportPath.description: Path for importing `internal.typelib.js` file from transpiled version of `metadata.typelib.ts` file that is generated by Typegen into your project root.

include.description: List of glob patterns matching modules which should be included in metadata.

includeDtsFiles.description: Include .d.ts files. The .d.ts are excluded by default.

exclude.description: List of glob patterns matching modules which should be excluded from metadata.

encode.description: Enable metadata encoding. Currently, the base32768 UTF-16 encoding will be used.

devMode.description: Enable or disable DEBUG mode (progress logging and extra warnings).
